pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bitcoin ABC is the name of open source software which enables the use of Bitcoin. It is designed to facilite a hard fork to increase Bitcoin's block size limit. "ABC" stands for "Adjustable Blocksize Cap".

use.flag: Build the end-user Qt GUI for the Bitcoin crypto-currency
Enable generation of QR Codes for receiving payments
Attempt to reduce exported symbols in the resulting executables
Use system univalue instead of the bundled one
Enable command-line client and transaction tool
Report blocks and transactions via zeromq
